name: sentinel-oracle
description: Sentinel: Autonomous AI Security Oracle using Chainlink CRE

scripts.setup: npm install && cd contracts && npm install && cd ../cre-workflow && bun install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:new: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-new-contracts.js --network sepolia
scripts.dev:cre: CRE_MODE=CRE concurrently "npm run api" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run api" "npm run frontend" "npm run chain"
scripts.full-demo: npm run deploy && npm run cre:simulate
scripts.demo:hackathon: npm run deploy:new && npm run cre:simulate:hackathon

author: Sentinel Team
